overview: Sex expert Madison Young teaches strap-on workshop for lesbian couples exploring orgasmic sex positions, how to find the right toy, and harness, and how to communicate strap-on fantasies to your partner. Madison's inspirational lesbian sex retreat motivates four lesbian couples to explore their own strap-on fantasies, demonstrating climactic strap-on techniques, new found intimacy and anal pleasure.
title: Lesbian Sex Education: Strap-On
